page.title: 07LLANGADOG _AGRICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: Since 1968 there has been an annual agricultural and horticultural show held in Llangadog.It is organised by members of the local Y.F.C.and other villagers.The show was held on a Wednesday,but is now always held on the first Saturday in August in a field at Glansawdde Farm. The entries in the Friesian cattle section is very high and the local people think that the standard of Llangadog show is higher than in the Royal Welsh Show.Horses,ponies,sheep and goats also compete. In the horticultural tent there are competitions in cookery,fruit,floral art,flowers,vegetables,handicraft and art.There is also a dog show, baby show,tractor handling,gymkhana and horse jumping.There is a rodeo or other kind of evening entertainment followed by a disco dance in the tent.
